comments_since_last_sample.body: No matter what adjustments we make. Simply too many people on this planet to sustain our way of life plain and simple.
Glaciers have been melting for THOUSANDS of years.  unmanaged forests and the fires create more CO2 than all the cars.  Sure let's make a cleaner world , without being fascists.

Then the rich are going to have to stop being greedy .  And be willing to not make as much money .  So the other people can live .  But really they don't give a f*** about nobody else but themselves .  So till it starts affecting them .  They're not going to care .  And what you're saying is true but the time it starts affecting them .  But it's going to be too late .  So people better do what they have to do to survive .  Now to the best of durability get ready for it .

What they really need to do is seek God's blessings .  God's trying to wake people up .
